Lyrics:
Maula mere, maula mere

aankhein teri - 2, kitni haseen

mujhako basaa le, iname tu
(ishq hai

ki inakaa aashiq, mein ban gayaa hoon
mujhako basaa le, iname tu

mujhase yeh har ghadi, meraa dil kahe
tum hi ho usaki aarzoo

teri hi ho sab guftagoo
baatein teri itni haseen, main yaad inko jab kartaa hoon
phoolon si aaye, khushaboo

saath tere, main hi rahoon
julfen teri, itni ghani
dekh ke inako, yeh sochataa hoon

(ishq hai
maula mere, maula mere maula mere, maula mere - 2) - 3

(meraa dil yahi bolaa, meraa dil yahi bolaa,
yaara raaj yeh usane hai mujh par kholaa
ki hai ishq mohabbat, jiske dil mein
usko pasand karta hai maulaa) - 3
cleaned_Lyrics: maula mere maula mere maula mere maula mere aankhein teri kitni haseen ki inkaa aashiq mein ban gayaa hoon mujhako basaa le iname tu ishq hai maula mere maula mere maula mere maula mere ki inakaa aashiq mein ban gayaa hoon mujhako basaa le iname tu mujhase yeh har ghadi meraa dil kahe tum hi ho usaki aarzoo mujhase yeh har ghadi mere lab kahe teri hi ho sab guftagoo baatein teri itni haseen main yaad inko jab kartaa hoon phoolon si aaye khushaboo rakh loon chhupaa ke main kahin tujhako saayaa bhi teraa naa main doon rakh loon banaa ke kahin ghar main tujhe saath tere main hi rahoon julfen teri itni ghani dekh ke inako yeh sochataa hoon saaye inake main jiyoon ishq hai maula mere maula mere maula mere maula mere meraa dil yahi bolaa meraa dil yahi bolaa yaara raaj yeh usane hai mujh par kholaa ki hai ishq mohabbat jiske dil mein usko pasand karta hai maulaa
